name: Modern MineStorm
description:
Modern MineStorm

This project is a student project done by Rémi Serra (Vynokris) and Alexandre Perché (vegasword) for the videogame school ISART Digital.
The goal was to recreate the "MineStorm" game released on Vectrex in 1982.

This game can be played with a gamepad or a keyboard, by 1 or 2 players.
Note: a gamepad is recommended to get the best playing experience.

More information, as well as the source code, can be found on the project's GitHub page.

Thanks to Gerald and Kenney for their assets packs.
